resources.string: On this years starting roster there are 13 varsity athletes. Two of them will graduate in 2023. Seven of them will graduate in 2024. Two of them will graduate in 2025, and two of them will graduate in 2026.
Out of the 13 athletes on this roster, three of them play forward, four of them play midfield, five of them play defense, and one plays goalie.
This past 2022 season the field hockey team went 12â€“2. The teams only two losses were to Wyoming Area during the regular season, and then to Selinsgrove during the playoffs.

This season the team won the League Championship. AHFH has not won this award in over 20 years. Also, the team won the sportsmanship award. This award is given out by the refs. They all get together and choose the team who the believe had the best sportsmanship towards other teams.
